original_text: But many people who are very important now will not be important then. And people who are not important now will become very important then.’
korean_text: 그러나 먼저 된 자로서 나중 되고 나중 된 자로서 먼저 될 자가 많으니라

sentences.original_text: But many people who are very important now
sentences.korean_translation: 하지만 지금은 매우 중요한 많은 사람들이

sentences.original_text: And people who are not important now
